alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 8:13AM CDT until October 12 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... North central Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 812 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Bella Vista to 2 miles east of Decatur to West Siloam Springs, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Bella Vista... Lowell... Pea Ridge... Gentry... Tontitown... Cave Springs... Decatur... West Siloam Springs... Highfill... Gateway... Springtown... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Hiwasse... Miller... Centerton... Elm Springs... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 74 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
